scripts.cypress:run_qa: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:run_qa:smoke: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa,grepTags=smoke --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run prereport; npm run cypress:run; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
